heading: Automation tools
paragraph: Tried, tested, and reviewed by the community

productCards.title: Stripe — Financial infrastructure for the internet
productCards.description: Accept payments, send payouts, automate financial processes, and ultimately grow revenue.

productCards.title: Expo — An open-source platform for building native apps
productCards.description: Build, deploy, and quickly iterate on native Android, iOS, and web apps from the same JavaScript codebase.

productCards.title: Remotion — Create videos programmatically
productCards.description: Make real MP4 videos written in React using CSS, SVG, and WebGL to make interesting motion graphics. Use programming to dynamically make different variants of videos and automate it using server-side rendering.

productCards.title: Zapier — Connect your apps and automate workflows
productCards.description: Easy automation for busy people. Zapier empowers you to automate your work across 5,000+ apps—so you can move forward, faster.

productCards.title: Tailwind UI — Beautiful UI components, by the creators of Tailwind CSS
productCards.description: Beautifully designed, expertly crafted components and templates, built by the makers of Tailwind CSS.

productCards.title: Trigger.dev — The open source background jobs framework
productCards.description: Create long-running jobs directly in your codebase with features like API integrations, webhooks, scheduling and delays.

productCards.title: AWS Lambda — An event-driven, serverless computing platform
productCards.description: A compute service that runs your code in response to events and automatically manages the compute resources, making it the fastest way to turn an idea into a modern, production, serverless applications.

productCards.title: Albato — A no-code platform for all automations
productCards.description: Integrate your applications into automated workflows using a no code builder.

productCards.title: monday.com — One platform for managing any project, task, and workflow
productCards.description: Used by 180K+ global customers, monday.com is a customizable and easy-to-use work management platform that maximizes efficiency, boosts collaboration, and increases productivity. Easily plan, centralize, streamline, and automate your teams' work and projects by utilizing powerful features such as no-code automations, real-time notifications, customizable dashboards, 200+ pre-made templates, multiple views, 72+ integrations, and more. From idea to execution, manage it all on one robust platform.

productCards.title: Make — Design, build and automate your work
productCards.description: A visual platform for anyone to design, build, and automate anything—from tasks and workflows to apps and systems—without coding.
